content.content: There is a growing set of individuals and projects who are building compiler and analytics tooling around LLVM.  Many of us met IRL at ETHDenver this week.   Please do join us on Telegram to continue the conversation, or on this Magicians Forum thread.    Telegram    Ethereum LLVM Developers Let’s collaborate on LLVM compiler tooling for Ethereum!      Three key active projects are SOLL + LLVM-EVM and Solang, both of which have working Solidity compilers using LLVM, for eWASM/EVM and WASM respectively:    GitHub    second-state/SOLL SOLL is a new compiler for generate Ewasm from solidity and yul. See a demo here: https://youtu.be/X-A6sP_HTy0 - second-state/SOLL         GitHub    hyperledger-labs/solang A Solidity to wasm compiler written in rust. Contribute to hyperledger-labs/solang development by creating an account on GitHub.         GitHub    etclabscore/evm_llvm Official repo of the EVM LLVM project. Contribute to etclabscore/evm_llvm development by creating an account on GitHub.      https://solang.readthedocs.io/en/latest/   businesswire.com   Ethereum Classic Labs Announces the EVM-LLVM Alpha Release ETC Labs has announced the long-awaited release of EVM-LLVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine- Low Level Virtual Machine) for the Ethereum Stack communities.      https://etclabscore.github.io/evm-llvm-website/
